name: Fractured (QuirkySquid)
description:
Fractured is a puzzle-platformer where you have to arrange the world as you go.

This game was made in about 6 months for the 2019 SkillsUSA Ohio State Championship. It won second place in the Interactive Application and Video Game Design competition.

I might pick this project up again at some point, but for the moment I'm going to focus on other things, like school. In the meantime, here it is for you to play!

All game assets created by myself.
